description: Build video creation capabilities into your applications
author: invideo
content: Create and edit videos through Claude using invideo's AI-powered video creation platform.

steps: Add the invideo server configuration with SSE transport

installation.claudeCode: claude mcp add --transport sse invideo https://mcp.invideo.io/sse

troubleshooting.issue: Authentication error: could not authenticate user
troubleshooting.solution: Verify OAuth credentials are valid in invideo account settings. Check username and password are correct if using basic auth. Ensure account isn't locked and re-authenticate if needed.

troubleshooting.issue: Video export or rendering queue taking too long
troubleshooting.solution: Check rendering queue status in invideo dashboard. Large videos take longer to process. Verify your account tier supports requested video length and quality. Contact support if queue is stuck.

troubleshooting.issue: Storage limit exceeded when uploading media
troubleshooting.solution: Check storage usage in invideo account settings. Delete unused videos to free space. Upgrade account tier for higher storage limits. Compress media files before upload to save space.

troubleshooting.issue: Unsupported media format error on upload
troubleshooting.solution: Verify media files are in supported formats (MP4, MOV for video; JPG, PNG for images). Convert unsupported formats using video converter. Check file isn't corrupted before uploading.
